channel.title: Zanaris V4 | Dustscape/TizenX Remake!
channel.description:
Welcome to Zanaris V4 A Brand New 667 Dustscape Remake
Home Of Zanaris V4 An up and coming Rsps Coded and Run by Rob. Vps Hosted 100% Uptime No lag , Anti DDOS Protection Fully Working Customs Auto Vote! Daily Updates Wonderful Staff and Community! A Unique server all round.
Castle Wars Damage Token Mini Game with Multiplier Zombie Shillings Mini Game High Risk Arena SafePk
Flawless PvP Combat Fully Working Specs Custom Weapons (Lite Weapons, Brutal Whip , Illuminesence) Killstreak Rewards Pvp Tokens and Upgrade Tokens High Risk Kill Global Notice ::gear ::lunars / ::ancients / ::curseson
Fully working Skills Comp Cape Master Dung Cape Skilling Fragments
Custom Slayer System Slayer Master Gear Custom 99 Slayer Npc's
Global Teleport Hub Slayer Teleports Spirit Tree
Fully Working Notice Board to show Updates Custom Trivia Questions (With Benefits) Fully Working Clan Chat
Great Donator Benefits Custom Donar Store Extra Bonuses for Donars+

What are you waiting for? Join the Adventure Today!
